verses.verse: If there arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you a prophet <S%H5030><s%>, or a dreamer <S%H2492><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of dreams <S%H2472><s%>, and giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee a sign <S%H226><s%> or a wonder <S%H4159><s%>,

And the sign <S%H226><s%> or the wonder <S%H4159><s%> come to pass <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, whereof he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto thee, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Let us go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, which thou hast not known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and let us serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8714><s%> them;

Thou shalt not hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the words <S%H1697><s%> of that prophet <S%H5030><s%>, or that dreamer <S%H2492><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of dreams <S%H2472><s%>: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> proveth <S%H5254><s%> <S%H8764><s%> you, to know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8800><s%> whether ye <S%H3426><s%> love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> with all your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all your soul <S%H5315><s%>.

Ye shall walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, and obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, and ye shall serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and cleave <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him.

And that prophet <S%H5030><s%>, or that dreamer <S%H2492><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of dreams <S%H2472><s%>, shall be put to death <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8714><s%>; because he hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to turn <S%H5627><s%> you away from the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, which brought you out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8688><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and redeemed <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8802><s%> you out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>, to thrust <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8687><s%> thee out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee to walk in <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%>. So shalt thou put <S%H1197><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8765><s%> from the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee.

If thy brother <S%H251><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of thy mother <S%H517><s%>, or thy son <S%H1121><s%>, or thy daughter <S%H1323><s%>, or the wife <S%H802><s%> of thy bosom <S%H2436><s%>, or thy friend <S%H7453><s%>, which is as thine own soul <S%H5315><s%>, entice <S%H5496><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee secretly <S%H5643><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Let us go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, which thou hast not known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, thou, nor thy fathers <S%H1><s%>;

Namely, of the 'elohim <S%H430><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> which are round about <S%H5439><s%> you, nigh <S%H7138><s%> unto thee, or far off <S%H7350><s%> from thee, from the one end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> even unto the other end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>;

Thou shalt not consent <S%H14><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, nor hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him; neither shall thine eye <S%H5869><s%> pity <S%H2347><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, neither shalt thou spare <S%H2550><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, neither shalt thou conceal <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him:

But thou shalt surely <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8800><s%> kill <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him; thine hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be first <S%H7223><s%> upon him to put him to death <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, and afterwards <S%H314><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of all the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And thou shalt stone <S%H5619><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him with stones <S%H68><s%>, that he die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; because he hath sought <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to thrust thee away <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8687><s%> from the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, which brought thee out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8688><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>.

And all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and shall do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> no more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> any <S%H1697><s%> such wickedness <S%H7451><s%> as this is among <S%H7130><s%> you.

If thou shalt hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> say in one <S%H259><s%> of thy cities <S%H5892><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee to dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> there, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Certain men <S%H582><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of B'liya'al <S%H1100><s%>, are gone out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> you, and have withdrawn <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of their city <S%H5892><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Let us go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, which ye have not known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%>;

Then shalt thou enquire <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and make search <S%H2713><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and ask <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8804><s%> diligently <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8687><s%>; and, behold, if it be truth <S%H571><s%>, and the thing <S%H1697><s%> certain <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, that such <S%H2063><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%> is wrought <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8738><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you;

Thou shalt surely <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8687><s%> smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of that city <S%H5892><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, destroying it utterly <S%H2763><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, and all that is therein, and the cattle <S%H929><s%> thereof, with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

And thou shalt gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of it into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the street <S%H7339><s%> thereof, and shalt burn <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>, and all the spoil <S%H7998><s%> thereof every whit <S%H3632><s%>, for the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: and it shall be an heap <S%H8510><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>; it shall not be built again <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

And there shall cleave <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8799><s%> nought <S%H3972><s%> of the cursed thing <S%H2764><s%> to thine hand <S%H3027><s%>: that the YY <S%H3068><s%> may turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the fierceness <S%H2740><s%> of his anger <S%H639><s%>, and shew <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee mercy <S%H7356><s%>, and have compassion <S%H7355><s%> <S%H8765><s%> upon thee, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee, as he hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>;

When thou shalt hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> all his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.
